data.title: engine detection: fix order/redundancy
data.body:
The previous order was
Gl, Sdl2, Gl, Cg, null
which effectively excluded Sdl2 on every system that supported
Gl as well.
We also don't need to initialize Renderer anymore outside of the
detection loop.

data.title: Generic Conditional Effects (DamageActor, ModifyActor, CreateObject, CreateSFX, etc.)
data.body:
## Concept

Create a new class of conditional effects that can be triggered from various sources, such as weapon impacts.
## Reason

Flexible approach to triggering effects and scripts, usable by weapons, actors, and map triggers.
(I.e. an effect to damage an actor can be called without needing an attached weapon.)
## Description

Would function very similar to Warheads.

An conditional effect can take parameters that define its exact behavior (Ex. Warheads are specified as having damage values, spread, sounds, etc.)

Conditional triggers determine if an effect is triggered or not.
## Possible conditional triggers

'On-hit': When a weapon hits a location
'On-hit-killing-shot': When a weapon hit results in at least 1 actor death
'After-Delay': After a delay of specified amount of ms.
'On-hit-Below-Health': When a weapon hits an actor that has less than specified percentage of health.
'On-fire': When a weapon is fired.
Etc.
## Possible effects

DamageActor: Same function as the damage component of a warhead.
CreateSFX: Same function as the sound and explosion components of a warhead.
ModifyActor: Modifies an attribute of the target actor. (Such as which user it belongs to, i.e. loyalty changes.)
CreateObject: Spawns an object (projectile, unit, building, etc.) at the target location.
## Example of use

A 'face-hugger' weapon has a DamageActor effect for causing damage, a CreateSFX effect for spawning the graphic and sound, a CreateObject and a DestroyObject effect.

The DamageActor trigger upon 'on-hit' and does damage to the target.
The CreateSFX triggers upon 'on-fire' and creates the dust-puff graphic and plays the alien-screech sound.
The CreateObject triggers upon a 'on-hit-killing-shot' and spawns a young alien.
The DestroyObject triggers upon a 'on-hit-killing-shot' and silently removes the face-hugger from the game.

<bountysource-plugin>

---

Want to back this issue? **[Place a bounty on it!](https://www.bountysource.com/issues/1364029-generic-conditional-effects-damageactor-modifyactor-createobject-createsfx-etc?utm_campaign=plugin&utm_content=tracker%2F36085&utm_medium=issues&utm_source=github)** We accept bounties via [Bountysource](https://www.bountysource.com/?utm_campaign=plugin&utm_content=tracker%2F36085&utm_medium=issues&utm_source=github).
</bountysource-plugin>

data.title: Sole Survivor/additional mod support
data.body:
This is a bucket list of items that will be required to support a Sole Survivor game mode. Some features might not be attainable (such as joining a game in-progress) and I may have missed a few, so this is high-level but covers a fair bit of it.
- [ ] Live game joining (depends on Save/Load serialization of game state)
- [x] Support SS map format through utility import (works in another branch, requires PR)
- [ ] Add entries for SS assets to the global mix database (not required, but useful)
- [x] Always show unit health bars (via #4054)
- [x] Spawning varying types of crates (via #4360)
- [x] Allow for individual stat leveling of hero units - armor, damage, movement speed, rate of fire, weapon range - [seen here](https://f.cloud.github.com/assets/566742/1804297/3287f418-6c47-11e3-8d99-3aeb4d0ba260.png). This will take some thought because the current experience points system levels up all of these stats equally (via #4383). 
- [x] Introduce new modifiers for rate of fire (via #6079)
- [x] Introduce new modifiers for weapon range (it's done but not sure when)
- [x] Crates to level up individual stats. (via #4383)
- [ ] Art for new crates - potentially use SS' existing crates, but these need to have shadows added to them, and potentially also effects for floating in water (RA mod support). Potentially use the wooden crate, and do a ton of palette remaps to them for varying colors.
- [ ] New art / interface similar to sole survivor, as a start. Work in progress seen here: [original game image](https://f.cloud.github.com/assets/566742/1816923/c58bec2a-6f5c-11e3-8185-92ffce3ba82e.jpg), [1st attempt](https://f.cloud.github.com/assets/566742/1816929/717a9518-6f5d-11e3-9fa0-54027af8e74f.png), [2nd attempt (improvement)](https://f.cloud.github.com/assets/566742/1816930/7a280e70-6f5d-11e3-9a90-3de074b2ff3f.png)
- [ ] Logic for specifying custom UI in a map.yaml/map.lua
- [x] Always showing the player's name above a player's "hero" unit (via #4393).
- [ ] Capture the Flag logic, or other objective based game logic (e.g. deathmatch).
- [ ] Allow an option to choose which announcer pack to use
- [ ] Attaching EVA announcer clips to specific events (a certain type of crate was picked up, or an objective was met).
- [ ] Custom crate behavior mentioned here: http://www.cnc-source.com/?page=content/ss/ssmisc
- [x] Tooltip changes - only show the unit name on the tooltip, hide country + name. This is currently done for neutral actors, but there should be a flag that can be set in the yaml. #6613
## <bountysource-plugin>

Want to back this issue? **[Post a bounty on it!](https://www.bountysource.com/issues/1363975-sole-survivor-additional-mod-support?utm_campaign=plugin&utm_content=tracker%2F36085&utm_medium=issues&utm_source=github)** We accept bounties via [Bountysource](https://www.bountysource.com/?utm_campaign=plugin&utm_content=tracker%2F36085&utm_medium=issues&utm_source=github).
</bountysource-plugin>

data.title: CrateSpawner changes
data.body:
Changes:
- Moved all crate spawning logic into CrateSpawner.cs (removed CrateDrop.cs)
- Added support for varying types of crates to be spawned, and specify the chance each crate can appear
- Updated RA maps to use CrateSpawner

I created a test map for CNC which is available [here](http://hamb.in/crate-testing.oramap). The [map](https://f.cloud.github.com/assets/566742/1804293/6af1c424-6c46-11e3-8d95-d2c560c45195.png) contains art for three different crates that were pulled from Sole Survivor.

There might be an unrelated bug - crate tool tips were not working.

data.title: Winforms dependency should be removed from OpenRA.Game
data.body:
Windows.Forms links against X11, which is a huge and otherwise unnecessary dependency that we force on OSX users.

The long (several minute) stall when XQuartz builds the font cache on its first launch is a relatively frequent support query from players who think that OpenRA has frozen.

data.title: How-To-Play guide needs an update
data.body:
https://github.com/OpenRA/OpenRA/wiki/The-New-Player's-Guide-to-OpenRA by @NukemBro needs an update as the rules changed. It relies very much on unlimited base-walking and does not explain how the build radius works.
- Explain how expanding with MCV works (build another one or deploy/redeploy and maybe defend it as it is extra vulnerable while on the go).

Screenshots with non-overbright "nuclear" player colors would be a plus. =)
